Skin_Acne.name: Acne
Skin_Acne.description: A common skin condition where hair follicles become clogged with oil and dead skin cells, leading to pimples, blackheads, or whiteheads.
Skin_Acne.symptoms: Whiteheads, blackheads, papules, pustules, cystic lesions, oily skin, possible scarring.
Skin_Acne.precautions: Keep skin clean, avoid touching face, use non-comedogenic products, maintain a balanced diet, avoid excessive scrubbing.
Skin_Acne.treatment: Over-the-counter creams with benzoyl peroxide, salicylic acid, topical retinoids, oral antibiotics, hormonal therapy for severe cases.

Skin_Actinic Keratosis.name: Actinic Keratosis (Solar Keratosis)
Skin_Actinic Keratosis.description: A rough, scaly patch caused by long-term sun exposure that can progress to squamous cell carcinoma.
Skin_Actinic Keratosis.symptoms: Dry, scaly patches or spots, color changes, itching or burning in affected areas.
Skin_Actinic Keratosis.precautions: Limit sun exposure, wear protective clothing, apply sunscreen daily, avoid tanning beds.
Skin_Actinic Keratosis.treatment: Cryotherapy, topical medications (5-FU, imiquimod), photodynamic therapy, laser therapy, minor surgical removal.

Skin_Basal Cell Carcinoma.name: Basal Cell Carcinoma
Skin_Basal Cell Carcinoma.description: Most common form of skin cancer, often appearing as a pearly bump or scaly patch.
Skin_Basal Cell Carcinoma.symptoms: Pearly bump, open sore that bleeds and doesn't heal, flat scaly reddish patch, scar-like lesion.
Skin_Basal Cell Carcinoma.precautions: Avoid direct sun exposure, use broad-spectrum sunscreen, wear hats and protective clothing, regular skin checks.
Skin_Basal Cell Carcinoma.treatment: Surgical excision, Mohs micrographic surgery, cryotherapy, topical therapies for superficial cases.

Skin_Melanoma.name: Melanoma
Skin_Melanoma.description: The most serious skin cancer developing from pigment cells (melanocytes).
Skin_Melanoma.symptoms: New mole or change in existing mole, asymmetry, irregular borders, multiple colors, diameter >6mm, evolving appearance.
Skin_Melanoma.precautions: Avoid UV exposure, use high SPF sunscreen, wear protective clothing, regular skin self-exams.
Skin_Melanoma.treatment: Surgical removal, sentinel node biopsy, immunotherapy, targeted therapy, chemotherapy for advanced cases.

Skin_Normal Skin.name: Normal Skin
Skin_Normal Skin.description: Skin without visible disease or abnormal lesions.
Skin_Normal Skin.symptoms: Even tone, no rashes, no lesions or abnormal moles.
Skin_Normal Skin.precautions: Maintain hygiene, protect from excessive sun, moisturize, eat a balanced diet, stay hydrated.

Skin_Chickenpox.name: Chickenpox
Skin_Chickenpox.description: A highly contagious viral infection causing an itchy, blister-like rash.
Skin_Chickenpox.symptoms: Fever, headache, tiredness, itchy red spots that become fluid-filled blisters.
Skin_Chickenpox.precautions: Vaccination, avoid contact with infected people, isolate infected individuals.
Skin_Chickenpox.treatment: Symptomatic relief with antihistamines, calamine lotion, antiviral drugs in severe cases.

Skin_Dermato Fibroma.name: Dermatofibroma
Skin_Dermato Fibroma.description: A benign skin nodule that usually appears on the legs or arms.
Skin_Dermato Fibroma.symptoms: Firm, raised, reddish-brown bump, usually painless.
Skin_Dermato Fibroma.precautions: Avoid skin trauma, no prevention needed.
Skin_Dermato Fibroma.treatment: No treatment needed unless removal for cosmetic reasons.

Skin_Dyshidrotic Eczema.name: Dyshidrotic Eczema
Skin_Dyshidrotic Eczema.description: A form of eczema causing small, itchy blisters on hands and feet.
Skin_Dyshidrotic Eczema.symptoms: Tiny blisters, intense itching, peeling or cracked skin.
Skin_Dyshidrotic Eczema.precautions: Keep hands dry, avoid irritants, moisturize regularly.
Skin_Dyshidrotic Eczema.treatment: Topical steroids, cold compresses, antihistamines, immunosuppressants for severe cases.

Skin_Nail Fungus.name: Nail Fungus (Onychomycosis)
Skin_Nail Fungus.description: Fungal infection causing thickened, discolored nails.
Skin_Nail Fungus.symptoms: Yellow or white spots, thick nails, brittle or crumbly edges.
Skin_Nail Fungus.precautions: Keep nails dry, wear breathable shoes, avoid walking barefoot in public showers.
Skin_Nail Fungus.treatment: Antifungal creams or oral medications, nail removal in severe cases.

Skin_Nevus.name: Nevus (Mole)
Skin_Nevus.description: A benign cluster of pigment cells on the skin.
Skin_Nevus.symptoms: Small, dark brown spots or growths, symmetrical shape.
Skin_Nevus.precautions: Sun protection, monitor for changes, regular skin checks.
Skin_Nevus.treatment: No treatment unless removal for cosmetic or medical reasons.

Skin_Pigmented Benign Keratosis.name: Pigmented Benign Keratosis
Skin_Pigmented Benign Keratosis.description: Common non-cancerous skin growth with a waxy, stuck-on appearance.
Skin_Pigmented Benign Keratosis.symptoms: Waxy, raised, brown or black spots.
Skin_Pigmented Benign Keratosis.precautions: No specific prevention, monitor for changes.
Skin_Pigmented Benign Keratosis.treatment: Removal by cryotherapy, curettage, or laser for cosmetic reasons.

Skin_Ringworm.name: Ringworm
Skin_Ringworm.description: Fungal skin infection causing a ring-shaped rash.
Skin_Ringworm.symptoms: Red, circular rash with clear center, itchy skin.
Skin_Ringworm.precautions: Keep skin clean and dry, avoid sharing personal items.
Skin_Ringworm.treatment: Topical antifungal creams, oral antifungal medication for severe cases.

Skin_Seborrheic Keratosis.name: Seborrheic Keratosis
Skin_Seborrheic Keratosis.description: Common benign skin growth with a waxy, warty appearance that typically appears with aging.
Skin_Seborrheic Keratosis.symptoms: Waxy, scaly, raised growths, brown or black color, stuck-on appearance.
Skin_Seborrheic Keratosis.precautions: No specific prevention, avoid irritating the lesions.
Skin_Seborrheic Keratosis.treatment: Removal by cryotherapy, curettage, electrocautery, or laser for cosmetic purposes.

Skin_Squamous Cell Carcinoma.name: Squamous Cell Carcinoma
Skin_Squamous Cell Carcinoma.description: Common skin cancer forming in squamous cells of the skin.
Skin_Squamous Cell Carcinoma.symptoms: Firm red nodule, scaly patch, sore that doesn't heal.
Skin_Squamous Cell Carcinoma.precautions: Avoid excessive sun exposure, use sunscreen, wear protective clothing.
Skin_Squamous Cell Carcinoma.treatment: Surgical removal, radiation, topical treatments for early lesions.

Skin_Vascular Lesion.name: Vascular Lesion
Skin_Vascular Lesion.description: Abnormal collection of blood vessels present at birth or developing later.
Skin_Vascular Lesion.symptoms: Red or purple patches, swelling, visible veins.
Skin_Vascular Lesion.precautions: Protect area from trauma, monitor for changes.
Skin_Vascular Lesion.treatment: Laser therapy, minor surgery if needed.

all_benign.name: All Benign Lesions
all_benign.description: Classification for all non-cancerous lesions across different organ systems.
all_benign.symptoms: Varies depending on location and type of benign lesion.
all_benign.treatment: Observation, symptomatic treatment, or removal if causing complications.

all_early.name: All Early Stage Conditions
all_early.description: Early-stage diseases or conditions detected before significant progression.
all_early.symptoms: Minimal or no symptoms, detected through screening or routine examinations.
all_early.precautions: Regular screening, maintain healthy lifestyle, follow medical recommendations.
all_early.treatment: Early intervention, monitoring, lifestyle modifications, targeted therapy.

all_pre.name: All Pre-malignant Conditions
all_pre.description: Pre-cancerous changes that may progress to malignancy if left untreated.
all_pre.symptoms: Usually asymptomatic, detected through screening tests.
all_pre.precautions: Regular screening, avoid risk factors, healthy lifestyle.
all_pre.treatment: Close monitoring, removal of abnormal tissue, preventive measures.

all_pro.name: All Progressive Conditions
all_pro.description: Conditions that tend to worsen or advance over time without treatment.
all_pro.symptoms: Progressive worsening of symptoms, functional decline.
all_pro.precautions: Early detection, regular monitoring, adherence to treatment.
all_pro.treatment: Aggressive treatment, symptom management, supportive care.

brain_glioma_tumor.name: Brain: Glioma Tumor
brain_glioma_tumor.description: A tumor arising from glial cells in the brain or spinal cord, possibly cancerous.
brain_glioma_tumor.symptoms: Headaches, seizures, vision problems, weakness, memory loss.
brain_glioma_tumor.precautions: No specific prevention; manage risk with regular health checks and avoid radiation exposure.
brain_glioma_tumor.treatment: Surgery, radiation therapy, chemotherapy, targeted therapy, supportive care.

brain_meningioma_tumor.name: Brain: Meningioma Tumor
brain_meningioma_tumor.description: A usually benign tumor from brain/spinal cord membranes.
brain_meningioma_tumor.precautions: No known prevention, regular monitoring if detected early.
brain_meningioma_tumor.treatment: Surgery, radiation therapy, observation for small asymptomatic tumors.

brain_normal.name: Brain: Normal Scan
brain_normal.description: A normal brain scan with no signs of tumors or abnormalities.
brain_normal.symptoms: Normal neurological function, no headaches, no unexplained symptoms.
brain_normal.precautions: Healthy lifestyle, avoid head injuries, manage chronic diseases.

brain_pituitary_tumor.name: Brain: Pituitary Tumor
brain_pituitary_tumor.description: Benign or rarely malignant tumor in the pituitary gland.
brain_pituitary_tumor.precautions: No known prevention, monitor symptoms and hormone levels.
brain_pituitary_tumor.treatment: Medication, surgery, radiation depending on size and type.

breast_benign.name: Breast: Benign Lesion
breast_benign.description: Non-cancerous breast lump like fibroadenoma or cyst.
breast_benign.symptoms: Movable lump, no pain, stable size.
breast_benign.treatment: Observation or surgical removal if large or symptomatic.

breast_malignant.name: Breast: Malignant Tumor
breast_malignant.description: Cancerous growth in the breast tissue that requires prompt treatment.
breast_malignant.symptoms: Lump in breast, nipple discharge, skin dimpling, change in breast shape.
breast_malignant.precautions: Routine self-exams, mammograms, healthy weight, limit alcohol.
breast_malignant.treatment: Surgery, radiation therapy, chemotherapy, hormonal or targeted therapy.

cervix_dyk.name: Cervix: Dyskaryosis
cervix_dyk.description: Abnormal cells in the cervix, possible pre-cancerous change.
cervix_dyk.symptoms: Usually asymptomatic, found via Pap test.
cervix_dyk.treatment: Colposcopy, possible removal of abnormal tissue.

cervix_koc.name: Cervix: Koilocytosis
cervix_koc.description: HPV-related cell changes in cervical tissue.
cervix_koc.symptoms: No symptoms, detected in Pap smear.
cervix_koc.treatment: Monitoring, removal of affected tissue if needed.

cervix_mep.name: Cervix: Metaplastic Epithelium
cervix_mep.description: Normal replacement of one cell type by another in the cervix.

cervix_pab.name: Cervix: Parabasal Cells
cervix_pab.description: Immature cells found during inflammation or menopause.
cervix_pab.symptoms: None; may relate to vaginal dryness.

cervix_sfi.name: Cervix: Squamous Cell Carcinoma
cervix_sfi.description: Cervical cancer starting in squamous cells.
cervix_sfi.symptoms: Irregular bleeding, pelvic pain, unusual discharge.

colon_aca.name: Colon: Adenocarcinoma
colon_aca.symptoms: Rectal bleeding, weight loss, changes in bowel habits.

kidney_cyst.name: Kidney: Cyst
kidney_cyst.description: Fluid-filled sacs that develop in the kidneys, usually benign.
kidney_cyst.symptoms: Often asymptomatic, may cause flank pain or urinary symptoms if large.
kidney_cyst.treatment: Observation for small cysts, drainage or surgery for large symptomatic cysts.

kidney_normal.name: Kidney: Normal
kidney_normal.description: Normal healthy kidney tissue and function.
kidney_normal.precautions: Stay hydrated, maintain healthy blood pressure, avoid nephrotoxic medications.

kidney_stone.name: Kidney: Kidney Stone
kidney_stone.description: Hard mineral deposits that form inside the kidneys and cause pain.
kidney_stone.symptoms: Severe back pain, blood in urine, frequent urination, nausea.
kidney_stone.precautions: Stay hydrated, limit salt and animal protein intake.
kidney_stone.treatment: Pain management, increased fluid intake, medications, shock wave therapy, surgery if needed.

kidney_tumor.name: Kidney: Tumor
kidney_tumor.description: Abnormal growth in kidney tissue that may be benign or malignant.
kidney_tumor.symptoms: Blood in urine, flank pain, palpable mass, weight loss.
kidney_tumor.precautions: Regular check-ups, avoid smoking, maintain healthy lifestyle.
kidney_tumor.treatment: Surgery, targeted therapy, immunotherapy, radiation therapy depending on type and stage.

lung_colon_aca.name: Lung: Colon Adenocarcinoma Metastasis
lung_colon_aca.description: Colon cancer that has spread to the lungs.
lung_colon_aca.symptoms: Shortness of breath, chest pain, persistent cough, fatigue.
lung_colon_aca.precautions: Regular follow-up for colon cancer patients, healthy lifestyle.
lung_colon_aca.treatment: Chemotherapy, targeted therapy, surgery, radiation therapy, palliative care.

lung_colon_n.name: Lung: Normal (Colon Cancer Patient)
lung_colon_n.description: Normal lung tissue in a patient with history of colon cancer.
lung_colon_n.precautions: Regular monitoring for metastases, maintain lung health.

lung_lung_aca.name: Lung: Lung Adenocarcinoma
lung_lung_aca.description: Primary lung cancer arising from glandular cells.
lung_lung_aca.symptoms: Persistent cough, chest pain, shortness of breath, weight loss.
lung_lung_aca.precautions: Avoid smoking, limit exposure to carcinogens, regular screening if high risk.
lung_lung_aca.treatment: Surgery, chemotherapy, targeted therapy, immunotherapy, radiation therapy.

lung_lung_scc.name: Lung: Squamous Cell Carcinoma
lung_lung_scc.description: Primary lung cancer arising from squamous cells, strongly linked to smoking.
lung_lung_scc.symptoms: Chronic cough, chest pain, hemoptysis, shortness of breath.
lung_lung_scc.precautions: Smoking cessation, avoid secondhand smoke, occupational safety.
lung_lung_scc.treatment: Surgery, chemotherapy, radiation therapy, immunotherapy, targeted therapy.

lymph_cll.name: Lymph: Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia
lymph_cll.description: Cancer affecting white blood cells and lymphoid tissue.
lymph_cll.symptoms: Fatigue, swollen lymph nodes, frequent infections, easy bruising.
lymph_cll.precautions: No known prevention, avoid infections, regular monitoring.
lymph_cll.treatment: Watch and wait approach, chemotherapy, targeted therapy, stem cell transplant.

lymph_fl.name: Lymph: Follicular Lymphoma
lymph_fl.description: Slow-growing cancer of the lymphatic system.
lymph_fl.symptoms: Painless swollen lymph nodes, fatigue, night sweats, weight loss.
lymph_fl.precautions: No known prevention, maintain immune system health.
lymph_fl.treatment: Watch and wait, chemotherapy, radiation therapy, immunotherapy, targeted therapy.

lymph_mcl.name: Lymph: Mantle Cell Lymphoma
lymph_mcl.symptoms: Swollen lymph nodes, fever, night sweats, weight loss, fatigue.
lymph_mcl.precautions: No known prevention, early detection important.
lymph_mcl.treatment: Intensive chemotherapy, targeted therapy, stem cell transplant, clinical trials.

oral_normal.name: Oral: Normal Tissue
oral_normal.symptoms: No symptoms, healthy appearance of oral tissues.
oral_normal.precautions: Good oral hygiene, regular dental check-ups, avoid tobacco and excessive alcohol.

oral_scc.name: Oral: Squamous Cell Carcinoma
oral_scc.description: Cancer of the mouth affecting squamous cells lining the oral cavity.
oral_scc.symptoms: Persistent mouth sores, white or red patches, difficulty swallowing, loose teeth.
oral_scc.precautions: Avoid tobacco and alcohol, maintain oral hygiene, regular dental exams.
oral_scc.treatment: Surgery, radiation therapy, chemotherapy, targeted therapy.

pancreatic_normal.name: Pancreatic: Normal Tissue
pancreatic_normal.description: Normal healthy pancreatic tissue and function.
pancreatic_normal.precautions: Maintain healthy diet, limit alcohol, avoid smoking, manage diabetes if present.

pancreatic_tumor.name: Pancreatic: Tumor
pancreatic_tumor.description: Abnormal growth in pancreatic tissue, potentially malignant.
pancreatic_tumor.symptoms: Abdominal pain, weight loss, jaundice, new-onset diabetes.
pancreatic_tumor.precautions: Avoid smoking, maintain healthy weight, limit alcohol consumption.
pancreatic_tumor.treatment: Surgery, chemotherapy, radiation therapy, targeted therapy, supportive care.
